name: Army Strike Force 2 PRO - Full Sniper Commando Warfare Version
name_original: Army Strike Force 2 PRO - Full Sniper Commando Warfare Version
description:
** THIS VERSION HAS NO IN GAME ADS **

You're a member of an elite strike force on a mission to take out a rouge terrorist group and rescue hostages. One by one you take the bad guys out, while trying to save the hostages. Will you come out victorious?

FEATURES

- Multiple environments.
- Headshots, sniper kills, and more!
- Awesome soundtrack.
